anyType

----
  	
===  Documentation ===

        
				Description of the placement on the hole on the surface of the green.
		
----
      
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
----
  	
===  Model ===

	<...>
            ( distances | coordinates ) 
  </...>

|| *Name* || *Description* || *Type* ||
|| coordinates ||  Description of the placement on the hole on the surface of the green with an alternate localisation system || golfml:RoomForExtension ||
|| distances ||  					Position of hole relative to the edges of the green.				 || golfml:HolePlacementWithDistances ||
